entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@OfficialSASSA @The_DSD @nda_rsa @GovernmentZA @GCISMedia @ewnupdates @eNCA @SABCNews @Newzroom405 Zakhele, AppID 398109, SA ID ####81. Your application for SASSA COVID19 SRD Grant is declined. Records indicate you had income in the last 18 months.

Now my question is, is this money for people who never work in their lives and people who lost their jobs in apartheid era?
